resources.string:
Hello! Welcome to Shine. Shine is a financial tracking app that lets users keep track of their expenses by entering in their transaction data.

On the home screen you can get started by adding a transaction from clicking the "New Transaction" button. From here, a popup will ask you enter several key items about the proposed transaction such as the amount, date of purchase, name of vendor, the category of the transaction, and finally how often the transaction occurs.

Shine also utilizes graphs in order for you to better understand your spending over longer periods of time and you can manipulate the graphs on the home screen.

Credits for shine go to Humza Ayub, Anish Malik, Raaha Azfar, and Ethan Root.
